messages.subject: Re: A new chapter in education: unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: I thought the article was interesting and had some good links. If you vote in their unschooling poll, we can change the current poll results depicting
messages.messageBody:
I thought the article was interesting and had some good links.

If you vote in their unschooling poll, we can change the current poll
results depicting unschooling as "goofing off".. : ) - Liz

Shannon in AZ with Neil 4 & Sean 1

messages.subject: Re: A new chapter in education: unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: FRUSTRATED!  I just typed my response the the article and hit the mouse on accident and my back button went!  GREAT!  I will not remember what I typed, I
messages.messageBody:
FRUSTRATED! I just typed my response the the article and hit the mouse on accident and my back button went! GREAT! I will not remember what I typed, I thought it was good but maybe not since that happened! huh? Well, I am bummed the media has to play such a pre-school role in response to HS/Unschooling.

Angela


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
